1.0.4
=====
* Style fixes

1.0.3
=====
 * More consistent handling of status

1.0.2
=====
* Initial stable release
* Better callback handling
* more documentation

1.0.1a
======
* Added String.startsWith and String.endsWith to JS String class, for
  those browsers that don't implement that.

1.0.0a
======
Initial release
